home.one:
1) Select default character
2) Select default weapon
3) Restore character health
4) Update character name

shop.one:
1) Buy Items
2) Sell Items
3) Upgrade Items
4) Buy Characters

market.one:
1) Sell Loud from orderbook / Create an order to buy Loud
2) Buy Loud from orderbook / Create an order to Sell Loud
3) Sell sword from orderbook / Create an order to buy sword
4) Buy sword from orderbook / Create an order to sell sword
5) Sell character from orderbook / Create an order to buy character
6) Buy character from orderbook / Create an order to sell character

develop.one:
Create cookbook(j)
Switch user(z)
Get initial py)lons
Get I)nitial Loud Coin
DevMode Test Items(b)

home desc.one:
You are now at home.
If you like to hunt something go to forest.
And if you like to buy/sell something go to shop.

forest desc.one:
You are now at forest.
You can hunt here or go back to home.

shop desc.one:
You are now at a shop.
If you want you can buy or sell items here.

market desc.one:
You are now at a marketplace.
You can do trading here for coin and items.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try
